Fact Sheet

Developer

Donuts Team

Publisher

USC Games

Genre

Racing, Skateboarding, Arcade

Release Date

May 2025

Platforms

PC (Steam & Itch.io)

Engine

Unity

Number of Players

1

Tagline

"Donuts! is a slapstick 3D racing and skateboarding game meets food delivery service."

Description

Donuts! is a slapstick 3D racing and skateboarding game meets food delivery service. You play as Mony, a first generation Cambodian-American, as she sets off to save her family's slowing donut business through means of food trucks, viral marketing, and radical tricks!

Features

  • Perform skateboard tricks in a food truck to make donuts.

  • Race against the clock to make your deliveries on time.

  • Gather a social media following to save your family's donut shop.

  • Explore a beautiful southern california-expired world.

  • Meet a colorful cast of characters and learn more about the cambodian-american experience.

About the Developer

The Donuts Team is a student project made as part of USC Games' Advanced Games Project capstone program. Directed by Timothy Quach and with over 50 team members the project was developed over the course of a year. Full credits found here.
